mapper.select: SELECT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS dmNum, DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS dmTitle, DM.APPROVAL_CODE AS apCode, APS.APPROVAL_NAME AS apName, DM.DOCUMENT_CODE AS dmCode, DS.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS dmName, MM.ID AS dmWriteId, MM.NAME AS dmWriter, DM.DOCUMENT_DATE AS dmDate FROM DM INNER JOIN MM ON DM.WRITER = MM.ID AND DM.COMPANY_CODE = MM.COMPANY_CODE INNER JOIN APS ON DM.APPROVAL_CODE = APS.APPROVAL_CODE INNER JOIN DS ON DM.DOCUMENT_CODE = DS.DOCUMENT_CODE WHERE DM.COMPANY_CODE=#{cmCode} AND DM.APPROVAL_CODE='C' ORDER BY DM.document_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AL WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM = #{dmNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AC WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM = #{dmNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COD WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM = #{dmNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DMC WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM = #{dmNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RF WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM = #{dmNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RD WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM = #{dmNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PL WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM = #{dmNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DM WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM = #{dmNum}
SELECT DEPARTMENT_CODE AS dpCode, COMPANY_CODE AS cmCode, DEPARTMENT_NAME AS dpName FROM DP WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{cmCode}
SELECT GRADE_CODE AS gdCode, GRADE_NAME AS gdName FROM GR

SELECT MM.COMPANY_CODE AS cmCode, MM.ID AS userId, MM.NAME AS userName, MM.GRADE_CODE AS grCode, GR.GRADE_NAME AS grName, MM.DEPARTMENT_CODE AS dpCode, DP.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS dpName FROM MM INNER JOIN DP ON MM.COMPANY_CODE = DP.COMPANY_CODE INNER JOIN GR ON MM.GRADE_CODE = gr.grade_code WHERE MM.COMPANY_CODE = ${cmCode}
